arguments.userFacingName: Homepage Remediation: Search Value Props Experiment
arguments.userFacingDescription: This experiment promotes the default Firefox homepage configuration for users that switched away from it. We want to communicate the recent improvements that should lead to a better user experience.

value.targeting: !homePageSettings.isDefault && homePageSettings.isCustomUrl && homePageSettings.urls[.host == 'google.com']|length > 0 && visitsCount >= 1 && userPrefs.cfrFeatures && currentDate|date - profileAgeCreated > 15770000000

content.text: When you use the Firefox homepage, you get the same great search experience while also supporting the only browser that’s backed by a non-profit.
content.heading_text: Support a better web with the Firefox homepage

value.targeting: !homePageSettings.isDefault && homePageSettings.isCustomUrl && homePageSettings.urls[.host == 'google.com']|length > 0 && visitsCount >= 3 && userPrefs.cfrFeatures && currentDate|date - profileAgeCreated > 604800000

content.text: The Firefox homepage keeps your top sites one click away with visual tiles. Save time by searching your favorite sites, bookmarks, history, and tabs from the search bar.
content.heading_text: Type less, find more with a personalized homepage

value.targeting: !homePageSettings.isDefault && homePageSettings.isCustomUrl && homePageSettings.urls[.host == 'google.com']|length > 0 && visitsCount >= 1 && userPrefs.cfrFeatures && currentDate|date - profileAgeCreated > 604800000

content.text: The Firefox homepage makes it easy to search the web, and serves up thought-provoking stories from Pocket right along with it.
content.heading_text: Get the web’s best content right on your homepage
